interactive

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactive.Settings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains the values of the interactive settings of the board handling.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean get_automatic_neckdown()
      If true, the trace width at static pins smaller the the trace width will be lowered automatically to the pin with, if necessary.
      boolean get_drag_components_enabled()
      allows dragging components with the route
      boolean get_hilight_routing_obstacle()
      If true, the current routing obstacle is hilightet in dynamic routing.
      int get_horizontal_component_grid()
      The horizontal placement grid when moving components, if > 0.
      boolean get_is_stitch_route()
      Route mode: stitching or dynamic
      ItemSelectionFilter get_item_selection_filter()
      The filter used in interactive selection of board items.
      int get_layer()
      get_layer.
      boolean get_manual_rule_selection()
      Indicates if the routing rule selection is manual by the user or automatic by the net rules.
      int get_manual_trace_clearance_class()
      The index of the clearance class used for traces in interactive routing in the clearance matrix, if manual_route_selection is on.
      int get_manual_trace_half_width(int p_layer_no)
      Get the trace half width in manual routing mode on layer p_layer_no
      int get_manual_via_rule_index()
      The index of the via rule used in routing in the board via rules if manual_route_selection is on.
      boolean get_push_enabled()
      allows pushing obstacles aside
      boolean get_select_on_all_visible_layers()
      indicates if interactive selections are made on all visible layers or only on the current layer.
      SnapShot.Attributes get_snapshot_attributes()
      Defines the data of the snapshot selected for restoring.
      int get_trace_pull_tight_accuracy()
      The accuracy of the pull tight algorithm.
      int get_trace_pull_tight_region_width()
      The width of the pull tight region of traces around the cursor
      int get_vertical_component_grid()
      The vertical placement grid when moving components, if > 0.
      boolean get_via_snap_to_smd_center()
      Via snaps to smd center, if attach smd is alllowed.
      boolean get_zoom_with_wheel()
      If true, the mouse wheel is used for zooming.
      void set_automatic_neckdown(boolean p_value)
      If true, the trace width at static pins smaller the the trace width will be lowered automatically to the pin with, if necessary.
      void set_current_pull_tight_accuracy(int p_value)
      Changes the current width of the pull tight accuracy for traces.
      void set_current_pull_tight_region_width(int p_value)
      Changes the current width of the tidy region for traces.
      void set_drag_components_enabled(boolean p_value)
      Enables or disables dragging components
      void set_hilight_routing_obstacle(boolean p_value)
      If true, the current routing obstacle is hilightet in dynamic routing.

      The horizontal placement grid when moving components, if > 0.
      void set_item_selection_filter(ItemSelectionFilter p_value)
      The filter used in interactive selection of board items.
      void set_manual_trace_clearance_class(int p_index)
      The index of the clearance class used for traces in interactive routing in the clearance matrix, if manual_route_selection is on.
      void set_manual_trace_half_width(int p_layer_no, int p_value)
      Sets the manual trace half width used in interactive routing.
      void set_manual_tracewidth_selection(boolean p_value)
      Sets the current trace width selection to manual or automatic.
      void set_manual_via_rule_index(int p_value)
      The index of the via rule used in routing in the board via rules if manual_route_selection is on.
      void set_push_enabled(boolean p_value)
      Enables or disables pushing obstacles in interactive routing
      void set_read_only(java.lang.Boolean p_value)
      Defines, if the setting attributes are allowed to be changed interactively or not.
      void set_select_on_all_visible_layers(boolean p_value)
      Sets, if item selection is on all board layers or only on the current layer.
      void set_selectable(ItemSelectionFilter.SelectableChoices p_item_type, boolean p_value)
      Changes the interactive selectability of p_item_type.
      void set_stitch_route(boolean p_value)
      Route mode: stitching or dynamic
      void set_vertical_component_grid(int p_value)
      The vertical placement grid when moving components, if > 0.
      void set_via_snap_to_smd_center(boolean p_value)
      Changes, if vias snap to smd center, if attach smd is allowed.
      void set_zoom_with_wheel(boolean p_value)
      If true, the wheel is used for zooming.
